name: Rewinder DX
description:
ARROWS = move

X=shoot

Z = go back in time and shoot LASER! (Reset cooldown on hit!)

The blue ship indicates the place where you will appear and shoot the laser.

More laser kill in chain = more points!!

-*--*--*--*--*--*--*--*--*--*--*-Let us know your score!! Have fun!-*--*--*--*--*--*--*--*--*--*-

-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-

Made for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 

More info about the game:

Your experimental exploration ship powered with warp curvature engine has caused a time/space instability that teleported you in a quadrant dominated by a weird and aggressive chtulu-like race of aliens. Your ship is not well equipped to fight... so you must take advantage of your rewind-warp-core, it brings the ship back a couple seconds in time and then beams an energy laser that instantly destroys your enemies and rises strong shields to protect you for a brief moment. If the laser finds his target, your gun and the warp-core itself will be recharged! Good luck!

team: Senor Bonito https://www.instagram.com/kaislair/,IDecade https://idecade.bandcamp.com/album/sinergy , Bafometto, Gas1312https://gas1312.bandcamp.com/
